2. Progressive supranuclear palsy (PSP)
3. Multiple system atrophy (MSA)
4. Frontotemporal dementia (FTD)
5. Primary lateral sclerosis (PLS)
6. Spinocerebellar ataxia (SCA)
7. Hereditary spastic paraparesis (HSP)
8. Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease (CMT)
